profile.name: Carlos
profile.title: Frontend Developer
profile.description: Product-minded front-end developer, dedicated to creating exceptional user interfaces and constantly learning new technologies. My experience in web applications highlights a track record of technical expertise. Emphasizing communication and a positive attitude, I strive for attention to detail and high-quality work, making me a valuable team player.
